Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Understand the Goal The user wants me to analyze an event log for a Procure to Pay P2P process identify anomalies based on general knowledge of the P2P process

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1001 Create Purchase Requisition Approve Purchase Requisition Issue Purchase Order Receive Goods Vendor Invoice Received Match Invoice to PO Release Payment Close Case Observation This looks like a very standard clean execution

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1002 Create Purchase Requisition Issue Purchase Order Vendor Invoice Received Release Payment Approve Purchase Requisition Receive Goods Match Invoice to PO Close Case Issue Purchase Order before Approval Approve Purchase Requisition late

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1003 Create Purchase Requisition Approve Purchase Requisition Issue Purchase Order Release Payment Vendor Invoice Received Receive Goods Match Invoice to PO Close Case Release Payment before Vendor Invoice Received and Receive Goods

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1004 Create Purchase Requisition Approve Purchase Requisition Receive Goods Issue Purchase Order Vendor Invoice Received Match Invoice to PO Release Payment Close Case Receive Goods before Issue Purchase Order

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Synthesize and Structure the Answer Identify Anomalies Anomaly 1 Case 1003 Payment released Invoice received Goods received after Explanation illogical data entry error simulation of anomaly Problem financial risk cash flow issues data integrity

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Anomaly 2 Case 1002 Issue Purchase Order before Approve Purchase Requisition Explanation PO issued without authorization Problem unapproved spending control breach liability

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Anomaly 3 Case 1004 Receive Goods before Issue Purchase Order Explanation backward process PO before goods receipt Problem data integrity system glitch administrative error

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Refine the Analysis Case 1001 Clean no issues Case 1004 Goods Received before PO anomaly in standard P2P flow

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final Polish Check Case 1002 PO issued then approved workflow violation Check Case 1004 Receive then Issue anomaly strongest anomalies Case 1003 reverse flow Case 1002 unauthorized PO Case 1004 backward execution
